title: Justin Amash
summary: Justin Amash (/əˈmɑːʃ/ ə-MAHSH;[1] born April 18, 1980) is an American lawyer and politician who served as the U.S. representative for Michigan's 3rd congressional district from 2011 to 2021. Originally a Republican, Amash joined the Libertarian Party in April 2020, becoming the party's first (and, as of 2021, only) member of Congress.
